effect.black_white: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.
effect.black_2_white_2: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages. If the user and target are the same gender, or either is genderless, this move will fail.

short_effect.black_white: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.
short_effect.black_2_white_2: Lowers the target’s Special Attack by two stages if it’s the opposite gender.

flavor_text.black_white: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target is charmed into harshly lowering its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: If it is the opposite gender of the user, the target is charmed into harshly lowering its Sp. Atk stat.
